text: Patriot Games is a 1992 American action thriller movie. Harrison Ford plays retired CIA analyst Jack Ryan. Anne Archer plays his wife Cathy Ryan. Thora Birch plays his daughter Sally Ryan. Sean Bean plays the IRA terrorist who wants to avenge his brother's death by Jack Ryan during a failed assassination attempt, and kill Ryan and his family. This movie was released on June 5, 1992. It was a financial success at the box office. It got very good reviews. Its sequel is the 1994 movie Clear and Present Danger. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1992 thriller movies Category:1992 action movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:1990s spy movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American spy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about assassinations Category:Movies about the Irish Republican Army Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Maryland Category:Movies set in Virginia Category:Movies directed by Phillip Noyce
title: Patriot Games
